trans-unit.source: Contains information about the properties of a digital signature.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureDescription"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureDescription"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.SecurityElement"></xref> from which to get the algorithms for the signature description.
The el parameter is `null`.

Creates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> instance with the specified key using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureDescription.DeformatterAlgorithm"></xref> property.
The key to use in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref>.
The newly created <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> instance.
Creates a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> instance using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureDescription.DigestAlgorithm"></xref> property.
The newly created <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> instance.

Creates an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter"></xref> instance with the specified key using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SignatureDescription.FormatterAlgorithm"></xref> property.
The key to use in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter"></xref>.
The newly created <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter"></xref> instance.
Gets or sets the deformatter algorithm for the signature description.
The deformatter algorithm for the signature description.
Gets or sets the digest algorithm for the signature description.
The digest algorithm for the signature description.
Gets or sets the formatter algorithm for the signature description.
The formatter algorithm for the signature description.
Gets or sets the key algorithm for the signature description.
The key algorithm for the signature description.
